DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and immunogenicity of an investigational pneumococcal vaccine in healthy adults.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of V110 a Pneumococcal Vaccine in Healthy Adults (V110-013)
DOC.criteria: Males and females in good health, ages 2040, with no history of pneumococcal vaccination Subjects with a recent febrile illness Known or suspected immune dysfunction, conditions associated with immunosuppression, and receipt of immunosuppressive chemotherapy, including longterm corticosteroid therapy
